data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the county of Salem access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Salem, Tamil Nadu, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the county of Salem, Tamil Nadu, India. Please, stir the 38,303 believers here to pray for awakening.
Spirit, help the 38,303 believers in Salem to start simple multiplying churches in their homes.
Father, help your children in Salem, Tamil Nadu, India find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Bazigar (Hindu traditions) people. Make the Bazigar (Hindu traditions) people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Jesus, help the local leaders in Salem, Tamil Nadu, India to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the county of Salem, Tamil Nadu, India need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.section_summary:
the county of Salem, Tamil Nadu, India has a population of 3,482,100.

We estimate Salem has 38,303 people who might know Jesus, 42,249 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 3,401,547 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: the county of Salem has (about) 38,303 people who know Jesus, 42,249 people who know about him culturally, and 3,401,547 people who are far from Jesus.
